subject: Basketball
NBA Championship
lead_paragraph: Miami Coach Erik Spoelstra urged his team to take a mental rest from basketball before trying to make an unprecedented comeback from a 3-1 deficit in the N.B.A. finals.
snippet: Miami Coach Erik Spoelstra urged his team to take a mental rest from basketball before trying to make an unprecedented comeback from a 3-1 deficit in the N.B.A. finals.
